bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I like to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🌼 I like sweet things
🐝 I make honey
💛 I am yellow and black

bug.question: I march in a line, carrying food back to my home. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small
💪 I can carry heavy things
🏡 I live underground

bug.question: I hop around and like to eat plants. I have long legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to eat grass
🟢 I am usually green
🐸 I am not a frog, but I jump!

bug.question: I am red with black spots and I am considered good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 Some people call me a ladybird
⚫ My spots help me hide
🌱 I eat other bugs that harm plants

bug.question: I glow in the dark. People like to catch me in jars at night. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I make my own light
🌙 I am most active at night
💡 My light helps me find a friend

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar, then build a chrysalis, and finally fly away. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I eat a lot of leaves when I am young
🎨 I have colorful wings
🦋 I drink nectar from flowers

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my dinner. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is made of silk
🕷️ I have eight legs
🪰 Flies get stuck in my home.

bug.question: I bite and drink blood. I can be very annoying in the summer. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I make a buzzing sound
😖 My bite can itch
🌃 I am more active at dusk

bug.question: I am a hard shelled bug, sometimes brown or black, and I crawl on the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🪲 I come in many shapes and sizes
🪵 Some of us live in wood.
💩 Some species eat dung.

bug.question: I live in a colony and build huge mounds from dirt and saliva. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 Some call my home a termitary.
🐜 I look and act similar to ants, but I am not one.
🏘️ I live in big group.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm cold and white. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I'm made of frozen water.
☃️ You can make a snowman with me.
🌨️ I often fall in winter.

weather.question: I am hot and bright. I help plants grow. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I appear during the day.
😎 You need sunglasses when I'm strong.
🔥 I give off heat.

weather.question: I fall from the sky and make everything wet. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 You need an umbrella when I come.
🌧️ Puddles form because of me.
☔ I help plants grow.

weather.question: I move the trees and make kites fly high. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 You can't see me, but you can feel me.
🪁 I can be gentle or strong.
💨 I make sailboats move.

weather.question: I'm a big, white puff in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I look like fluffy sheep.
🌥️ I can block the sun.
☁️ I'm made of water droplets.

weather.question: I'm a bright light in the sky after it rains. I have many colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 You can see me when the sun shines through the rain.
🔴 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.
✨ I'm an arc in the sky.

weather.question: I'm a loud noise that comes after lightning. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I come from storm clouds.
⛈️ Sometimes I make you jump.
🔊 You hear me after you see a flash.

weather.question: I am a storm with strong winds that spin around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I can lift things up into the air.
🌀 I look like a funnel cloud.
🏠 It is best to be inside when I appear.

weather.question: I am very cold and snowy weather with strong winds. What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 Wear layers when I'm around!
🌬️ The wind makes it feel even colder.
🌨️ I can make it hard to see.

weather.question: I am a very strong storm over the ocean, with a swirling center called an eye. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I have high winds and heavy rain.
🧭 I can cause a lot of damage to coastal areas.
🌀 I spin counter-clockwise in the Northern Hemisphere.
